definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: You are monstrously audacious, how dare you misappropriate public funds?
sentences.chinese: 你真是狗胆包天，公家的钱也敢挪用？

definition: how can this be so? (idiom); preposterous/ridiculous/absurd
to have the impertinence/to have the cheek to
to work against the interests of sb one derives support from/to double-cross one's employer/to bite the hand that feeds you
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
if this can be tolerated, what cannot? (idiom)/enough is enough
pinyin: shi4 ke3 ren3 , shu2 bu4 ke3 ren3

definition: to dare (negative connotation)/to have the audacity to (do sth)
a dog threatens based on master's power (idiom); to use one's position to bully others
